content.text: Several pull requests were recently completed in the elizaOS/eliza repository. The team removed plugin-local-ai (PR #4439) and plugin-openai (PR #4511) from the monorepo. They also implemented global options for creating and setting up monorepo commands (PR #4509), added strict types, DTS generation, and plugin-bootstrap functionality (PR #4504), and updated the repository to use the correct and latest Bun versions (PR #4522). Additionally, docstrings were added to the api-cleanup module (PR #4521), and agent loading performance was improved for scenarios with many agents (PR #4519).

Three pull requests are currently open in the elizaOS/eliza repository: PR #4518 by 0xbbjoker adds integration tests to the project. PR #4515 by lalalune addresses Shaw bugfixes. PR #4517 by yungalgo is related to ELIZA290 and focuses on plugins and agent commands (part 2).

From May 10-11, 2025, the elizaos/eliza repository had 10 new pull requests with 7 of them merged. There were no new issues reported during this period. The repository had 12 active contributors working on it.

The source provides information about the top contributors for the elizaOS/eliza GitHub repository. However, no specific details about the contributors or their contributions are provided in the source text.
